title: Fun Challenge: Broken sign "Casa de Campo" Script font
author: derek@signsofsu...

comments.content:
Three rather different versions of \_a\_ mean it's a freeform hand-lettered script. Expressive swirls.  
don
What Don said. It's a bummer that got busted, 'cause it was good work. Any way to track down the artist (old invoices, etc.)?
I'll hand trace it. Thanks guys.
